entities.description: The type of injury sustained, such as minor injury, broken bones, or other major injuries.
An apparent minor injury sustained by an individual.
An apparent broken bone sustained by an individual.
An unspecified major injury other than broken bones.
A potential internal injury that may have been sustained.
The loss of teeth sustained as an injury.
A state of being unconscious due to injury.
A person who is providing responses to the survey.
A data collection method used to gather information from respondents.
The time span within which the survey responses are collected.
Absence from school by a respondent.

relationships.description: The type of injury sustained by the respondent.
Relates the survey to the time period of the past 30 days.
